artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Openweave warp stripes in various threads and textures. Warp & weft undetermined. Beige, yellow, rust, white in one. Yellow, beige & metalllic in other. Inside folder reads "Cornsilk, flameproofed" (beige, yellows, white, rust, brown, , gold metallic)

title: Cornsilk - Development and Sampling
